articles.description: Ruben Amorim to Man Utd updates, Carabao Cup reaction & Premier League latest news
articles.title: Carabao Cup reaction LIVE: Man City & Villa out, Man Utd, Liverpool, Spurs through

articles.description: Prospective new Manchester United coach Ruben Amorim is expected to stay at Sporting until next month's international break.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Sporting want prospective new Manchester United manager to remain until international break

articles.description: England prop Joe Marler could have chosen his words better when he called for the All Blacks’ haka to be "binned", says the New Zealand coach.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Joe Marler's haka jibe criticised by All Blacks coach Scott Robertson

articles.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers clinch the 2024 World Series after recovering from 5-0 down to beat the New York Yankees 7-6 at Yankee Stadium and seal a 4-1 series victory.
articles.title: Dodgers beat Yankees to win World Series in game five in New York

articles.description: England white-ball captain Jos Buttler adds a year to his central contract, signing until the autumn of 2026.
articles.title: Jos Buttler joins Ben Stokes in extending England central contract

articles.description: La Liga champions Real Madrid's match against Valencia, scheduled for Saturday, is postponed after devastating flash floods in Spain.
articles.title: Spanish floods: Real Madrid vs Valencia in La Liga postponed

articles.description: Beauden Barrett has been picked ahead of Damian McKenzie at fly-half for New Zealand’s meeting with England on Saturday.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Beauden Barrettto start at fly-half

articles.description: Bronny James scored his first NBA basket for the Los Angeles Lakers in a 134-110 defeat by the Cleveland Cavaliers.
articles.title: Bronny James: LeBron's son hits first NBA points in Los Angeles Lakers defeat

articles.description: South Africa register their record Test win, thrashing Bangladesh within three days to remain on track to reach the World Test Championship final.
articles.title: South Africa thrash Bangladesh to remain on track for World Test Championship final

articles.description: It is Erling Haaland out and Mohamed Salah in this week, with the aim of capitalising on the Egyptian's impressive run of recent returns, writes Thomas Woods.
articles.title: FPL tips and team of week 10 - captain Mohamed Salah this week, pick Bukayo Saka and Rayan Ait-Nouri
